transcript: if you said I have trouble getting close to girls because my mom and I aren't close you give power to something that happened in the past that you can't change to things that are happening in the present that you can change and so wouldn't it be more useful to say in the past I have struggled to get close to girls period now that could be for a number of reasons thing is is that you don't know what reason it is all we know is that you struggle to get close to girls well then just look at what it would take to get close to girls and then do that rather than having this other thing that's attached to the behavior that you can't do anything about it just makes changing who you are and what you do a lot easier
